name: ZXing.Net.Core
title: ZXing.Net Core
description: Partial port of ZXing.Net on .Net Core.

packOptions.summary: .Net Core port of ZXing.Net barcode reader/writer library (alpha release).
packOptions.releaseNotes: Partial porting of the core/common classes to .Net Core (Experimental). Note: The current release does NOT contain barcode encoding/decocing functionalites. It merely contains some base/common classes. WIP.
